QuestData.Title: Tar Get of Opportunity
QuestData.Description: General Vul'gath leads this band of Thunderlord. He is a coward and hides in his hut, yelling orders at his warriors through the walls.$b$bWe will need to show him that his flimsy defenses can not stand against the Frostwolves!$b$bI'll need some tar to carry this out. There are a couple of tar pits to the south, go gather a few globs from the oozes that reside there and bring them to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 5 Globs of Sticky Tar from the Black Tar's in the Bones of Agurak.
QuestData.RewardText: Ugh, those smell awful! No, I don't need to see them. I'll take you at your word that you have them all.$b$bLet's get a move on before another Thunderlord patrol stumbles upon me.
